gauze.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: very thin transparent material with very small holes in it
gauze.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: thin cotton with very small holes in it that is used for tying around a wound
gauze.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His hands were wrapped in gauze bandages.
gauze.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a material made of thin threads of metal or plastic
gauze.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: They covered the tubes with wire gauze.
